name: Fliese
description:
"Fliese" is an minimal logic puzzle game.

Your goal is to turn all the pieces on the board into a clear color, with each type of piece changing the board in their specific way. Play trough 120 levels of minimalist aesthetic relaxing meditation, unlocking new levels as you go.

Features
  • 120 levels
  • Color Modes
  • Minimalistic
  • Relaxing
  • Simple
  • Meditative soundtrack
